system.description:
Enlightened Minds are those who truly meld the adept’s dedication to honing their bodies and the scholar’s equal dedication to honing their mind into a single wall of disciplined skill.  If a healthy mind truly does reside in a healthy body, there is no greater evidence to be found than these focused warrior-philosophers. You gain the following benefits:

  • You gain a +1 bonus to your choice of your Intelligence or Dexterity score, to a maximum value of 20.
  • You gain proficiency with two additional skills, one each from the Adept and Scholar class lists. You may always choose to use intelligence on checks made with the chosen two skills.
  • You may spend an exertion point whenever you make a skill check using intelligence to gain an expertise die on the check, and if you roll a natural 1 on such a check you may spend 2 exertion to re-roll it.
system.prerequisite: 3 Levels in Scholar, 3 Levels in Adept (Mentalist archetype)
